name: The Moonshot Agenda
description:
Sourcecode on GitHub: https://github.com/Brutal-Rabbit/The-Moonshot-Agenda
Created with Godot 3.2.4
Brutal-Rabbit Team:
* Goon
* Mortarion
* Rinma

Instructions:
* Hire people to generate resources
* A new guy costs 500 money
* In each building can work up to 4 workers
* More workers = more resources
* For 1500 energie you can sabotage an enemie
* For 10.000 Science you can shoot the moon destroying laser
* Enemies win when they reach 30.000 Points
